item.title: Hugo blog site github local repo sync
item.description: This blog content is generated by the Hugo static site generator and integrated with GitHub. Steps through publishing and pushing the newest content publicly. Hugo Local Setup Submodule GitHub Pages Hugo Local Setup Testing hugo blog site github Create two repositories blog –> public local-devnull-hub.io –> public Clone blog local git or create with hugo new git clone http://localhost/user/blog.git cd to blog Create new hugo new site blog-local-devnull.
